snippet: Abduweli Ayup, who sought to teach the language native to most Uighurs, was reportedly released early from a sentence for “illegal fund-raising.”
abstract: Uighur linguist and poet Abduweli Ayup is reportedly released from prison in Xinjian, China.
lead_paragraph: Abduweli Ayup, who sought to teach the language native to most Uighurs, was reportedly released early from a sentence for “illegal fund-raising.”

headline.main: China Is Said to Have Freed Jailed Uighur Linguist
headline.print_headline: China: Uighur Poet Freed, Report Says
